text: My inner monologue is making me my own worst enemy  How to I change it I ve been at least passively suicidal now for about the past six months   I won t bore you with the details  but my life has undergone very stressful and tumultuous changes since last Christmas or so  and most of it was self inflicted   As a result  I spend all day  every day calling myself a failure  even though I know that that s not necessarily the case  and some of my more immediate issues have since been resolved    As a result of my self destructive thought patterns  I ve been going out of my way to spend as much time as possible around other people so that I can escape from myself  if that makes sense   I know I can t go on like this much longer   Besides seeing a therapist  which I ve started doing  what else can I do to change these thought patterns
summary: My life has undergone stressful changes since last Christmas and most of it was self inflicted. I spend all day every day calling myself a failure. I've been at least passively suicidal for about the past six months. I'm seeing a therapist and trying to change my thought patterns.
cleaned: life undergo stressful change christmas self inflict spend day day call failure passively suicidal past month see therapist try change thought pattern

text: Just being OpenTo anyone who takes the time to read this  thank you I m what you would consider an antisocial young adult  Homeschooled for the last   years with no friends  I don t have much self confidence  I m short  among other things  I used to crave a relationship and I let it make me bitter I ve been struggling with a pornography and masturbation addiction  I m a Christian and it completely goes against everything I believe  I feel like the self worth issues and the addiction are very much related I ve been apart of a group on reddit called Nofap Christians  and honestly it has been a God send for me  I ve struggled with suicidal thoughts for almost a year now  It almost feels like there is no reason to live sometimes  When I first joined I found freedom for nearly half a year and ended up falling back into the same lifestyle that made me miserable  It is so easy to feel like there is no hope   I can t count the number of times I ve relapsed  and I feel like it is just taking one piece of me at a time  I don t want to get to the point where I don t care anymore  I ve been so close to suicide before  I ve got a caring family and a few people I know who I really care for  Sometimes I just feel like it wouldn t matter if I was gone   The isolation doesn t help  I don t get out a ton and its terrifying trying to make friends  I m great when I know a person but meeting people is absolutely terrifying  That fear keeps me where I am at  and I don t like it  I don t know where I am going with this post  but I just feel like things are hopeless  I can put on a smile but there are times I am really struggling with wanting to live   If you ve made it this far  thank you
summary: To anyone who takes the time to read this post, I thank you. I am an antisocial young adult homeschooled with no friends. I have struggled with suicidal thoughts for almost a year now. I used to crave a relationship and I let it make me bitter. I'm a Christian. I've been apart of a group on reddit called Nofap Christians and it has been a God send for me.
cleaned: take time read post thank antisocial young adult homeschooler no friend struggle suicidal thought year crave relationship let bitter christian apart group geddit call nova christians god send

text: I m done I honestly don t know what I m still doing here  Last year I ve already attempted once and lucky enough no one even knew it was an attempt  I just ended up in a hospital  At any case  after that incident  I continued on  Just dealing day to day basis  I go to school and do my school work just because it entertains me  After that  I usually end up playing video games or chatting with a friend to keep myself cheered up and not think about it Lately the only friend I talk to has decided I don t exist  I feel like I m just invisible and no one would even know I exist  So what stops me right now to not just end it  Before because I know my friend would wonder where the hell I am  Now  honestly  nothing  Nothing is keeping me from doing it
summary: Last year she tried to kill herself once and ended up in hospital. Now she's just dealing with school work and playing video games. Recently her only friend has decided she doesn't exist and she feels invisible. Nothing stops her from ending it.
